mapper.insert: insert into db_ebaytotalsales (SEQUENCEID, EBAYMANAGEID, 'NAME', STANDARDVALUE1, VALUE1, STANDARDVALUE2, VALUE2, STANDARDVALUE3, VALUE3, STANDARDVALUE4, VALUE4, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, OPER, CORPID ) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ebaymanageid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardvalue1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardvalue2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardvalue3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardvalue4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: update db_ebaytotalsales set EBAYMANAGEID = #{ebaymanageid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARDVALUE1 = #{standardvalue1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALUE1 = #{value1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARDVALUE2 = #{standardvalue2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALUE2 = #{value2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARDVALUE3 = #{standardvalue3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALUE3 = #{value3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARDVALUE4 = #{standardvalue4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALUE4 = #{value4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, EBAYMANAGEID, 'NAME', STANDARDVALUE1, VALUE1, STANDARDVALUE2, VALUE2, STANDARDVALUE3, VALUE3, STANDARDVALUE4, VALUE4, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, OPER, CORPID from db_ebaytotalsales where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
